name: Open Face Pork Belly Sandwich With A Ramen Bun / Jelly Filled Everything Bagel Nut
description: Today, Josh and Mike are all about fusionâ€¦ fusing barbecue with Japanese to make an Open-faced Pork Sandwich with a Ramen Bun, and fusing bagels and doughnuts into one perfect circle of food. The brothers will also show you a super useful trick.
